accountOpen.answer:
Hey, i can help you with  opening a new account 
 could you please tell me which account you want to open? 
 Savings or a Business account?
accountOpen.answer.retry:
Could you please tell me 
 Savings or a Business account?
accountSavings.answer: To Open your savings account please contact the nearest branch with your ID proof
accountBusiness.answer: To Open your business account please contact the nearest branch with your ID proof & Business Registration documents
exit.answer: Are you sure you want to exit this dialog?
accountOpen.thanks: Okay, please let me know if i can help with something else.
